item.title: Spam me
item.description:
My good friend Dan Coulter set me up with an e-mail account to test [DreamHost][2]‘s spam filtering. If you’re not a spammer, you can stop reading this post now.

So please send all of your pharmacy advertisements, stock tips, and other spam to:

Update: Removed e-mail. Testing has been over for a long time. ðŸ˜‰

[2]: http://www.dreamhost.com/
